subject: Support required
description_text:
Hi I have just received the
Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter and I am having trouble attaching the shift knob to the shift rod. I have tried using the M8 adapter provided but this will not fit the underside of the shift knob.

Could you please advise? Thank you

Sara Mobbs

conversations.body_text: Hi Sara Mobbs,  Please provide some photos to illustrate the situation, so I can better understand it and assist you.Â
